long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scroll automatically and effortlessly with the tap of a key.

scrollMe allows you to scroll through web page content at the click of a button. 

SET your SCROLL KEYS and SPEEDS and scrollMe will smoothly guide the page as you read your favorite content.

SET up to 3 scroll SPEEDS and a scroll key for each speed.  

INSTRUCTIONS: Pin the scrollMe to your taskbar   >>   open it and click the green button with your mouse   >>   press any key on your keyboard to set which key you want to start and stop scrolling. 

You control when it scrolls and the speed it scrolls with a click of your keyboard. 

Browse the internet and turn-on scrollMe when it’s convenient.

Are you tired of clicking through your favorite blog, an interesting article, forum or Pinterest? 

Use scrollMe and ease your frustrations…
